Email swindler Jordan Hall loses bid for reduced sentence after $250k thefts https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/email-swindler-jordan-hall-loses-bid-for-reduced-sentence-after-250k-thefts/CW775C22SFBOZFEDZVA5H2WVSE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/email-swindler-jordan-hall-loses-bid-for-reduced-sentence-after-250k-thefts/CW775C22SFBOZFEDZVA5H2WVSE/ Craig KapitanJordan Hall was awaiting trial for $179k in thefts when he defrauded IRD of $138k. Wed, 01 Jan 2025 16:00:00 +0000 After gaining access to victims' email accounts, Jordan Gregory Hall was able to obtain passports, driver's licenses and credit cards as part of a sophisticated scam that fuelled his gambling and methamphetamine addictions.
